name: Poison
description: Damage from toxic substances, venoms, and poisonous gases that sicken and harm creatures through toxicity.

vulnerabilityCommon: No standard creatures have poison vulnerability

specialRules: Does not affect objects (targets living creatures only)
Often accompanied by the Poisoned condition
Many creatures are immune to poison damage and the poisoned condition
Constructs and undead are typically immune
Poison damage is distinct from the Poisoned condition
Some poisons deal damage over time
Objects have immunity to poison damage
